text: Adele is a language that is spoken in Western Africa. It is the language of the Adele people. There are 10,000 to 12,000 speakers in Ghana, and about 15,000 speakers in Togo. The language is spoken in the border region between Ghana and Togo, in central eastern Ghana, and Western Togo. The speakers call the language Gidire. == References == ==Books and articles== * * * * * * * * * Category:Languages of Ghana Category:Languages of Togo
title: Adele language
